name: Leukocyte Warriors
description:
Leukocyte Warriors is a side-scrolling 2D game, where the players controls two customizable leukocytes. The objective is to defeat threats to the human body, like bacteria, and achieve the highest score!

This game was developed by Game Design students over the Pontifical Catholic University of Campinas, for the 2nd semester discipline, PROJETO INTEGRADO EM JOGOS DIGITAIS II, in the 1st semester of 2018.
